mapper.select: /* team-admin.list */ select hteam.hong_team_uid ,hteam.team_category ,hcode.code_name as team_category_name ,hteam.team_nm ,hteam.member_num ,hteam.team_short_intro ,hteam.team_intro ,hteam.team_profile ,hteam.represent_id ,huser.user_nm as represent_name ,hteam.approval_yn ,case when hteam.approval_yn = 'Y' then '승인' else '미승인' end as approval_str ,hteam.use_yn ,case when hteam.use_yn = 'Y' then '사용' else '미사용' end as use_str ,hteam.delete_yn ,( select count(*) from hong_team_user htuser where htuser.hong_team_uid = hteam.hong_team_uid and htuser.delete_yn = 'N' ) as total_member_num from hong_team hteam left join hong_user huser on hteam.represent_id = huser.user_uid left join hong_file hfile on hfile.hong_file_uid = hteam.team_profile and hfile.del_yn = 'N' and hfile.saved = 'SAVED' left join hong_code hcode on hcode.code_val = hteam.team_category and hcode.upper_code_val = 'TEAM_CATEGORY' and hcode.use_yn = 'Y' and hcode.delete_yn = 'N' where hteam.delete_yn = 'N'

/* team-admin.teamUserList */ select hteam.hong_team_uid as hong_team_uid ,huser.user_uid as user_uid ,huser.user_nm as user_nm ,huser.user_email as user_email ,huser.role as user_role ,hcode.code_name as user_role_name ,case when hteam.represent_id = htuser.user_uid then '대표' else '팀원' end as represent_yn ,to_char(htuser.join_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as join_date ,case when htuser.approval_yn = 'Y' then '승인' else '미승인' end as approval_yn_str from hong_team hteam inner join hong_team_user htuser on htuser.hong_team_uid = hteam.hong_team_uid inner join hong_user huser on huser.user_uid = htuser.user_uid left join hong_code hcode on hcode.code_val = huser.role and hcode.upper_code_val = 'USER_ROLE' and hcode.use_yn = 'Y' and hcode.delete_yn = 'N' where hteam.hong_team_uid = #{hongTeamUid}
